title: Pixel 3 on T mobile overseas (England and France). Compatible?
content: I have a Pixel 3 with T-mobile as my carrier, which provides free data (2G) and texting while traveling to select countries. I checked compatibility on their website and it says that my device is not compatible in England or France. This seems odd to me, since Pixel is supposed to be able to be used almost anywhere in the world. What am I missing?
